message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.IR 

This paper deals with natural language generation using deep learning techniques, specifically the RNN Encoder-Decoder structure. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). Additionally, the paper involves the use of machine learning algorithms to generate poetry, which falls under the category of Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also discusses the use of attention mechanisms, which is a popular technique in deep learning and falls under the category of Machine Learning (cs.LG). The paper also involves the use of neural networks to learn patterns and structures in the data, which falls under the category of Neural and Evolutionary Computing (cs.NE). Finally, the paper discusses the use of topic words to generate poetry, which involves information retrieval techniques and falls under the category of Information Retrieval (cs.IR).
